channel.title: Could I do GWD? Got any tips for me?
channel.description:
So I've been training my combat like crazy (78 to 102 in about 3 weeks, only about 7 days of actually playing though)
So my first question, do you think that I could do Bandos GWD? In a team? How many others would I need?
Here are my stats/equipment: (obviously I will be melle'ing) [center][url=http://img830.imageshack.us/img830/1775/mystatsq.png]Click here for full size (no fuzzy skills)[/url] [img]http://img830.imageshack.us/img830/1775/mystatsq.png[/img][/center]
If there is anyone with a lot of GWD experience, can you tell me how often you get a good drop in the throne room? Can you give any tips that are not listed in normal guides?
Thanks. :)

item.title: Could I do GWD? Got any tips for me?
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

[quote=“lunaghand, post:34, topic:354303”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=450597.msg3310695#msg3310695 date=1281961177]

I have pretty much the same combat stats, but dang you have horrible range:/ I haven’t done godwars before either, but i’m gonna wait until i have 99 prayer and combat stats or something.
[/quote]LOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOL GL

Yeah exactly, that means I won’t be doing godwars for a while so i don’t have any deaths or major loss of items to worry about.[/quote]

Nah, you don’t need to wait that long, bandos is easy as fuck man. I’ve been doing it since i was 100 cb and like 50 prayer, even at that low alli took was 3 p pots and an inven of sharks, i had friends that helped me get on teams etc. Then once i got 110 cb it got easy, with the 110+ teams then moved up combat and all it did was get eaiser. Now all i take is 1 p pot sharks super sets andfruit bats/bunyips. Its soo easy, no reason to wait until you max combat etc, if boss gets on you ull drop as fast as a max cb=a lvl 100. He 2 hits kids all the time that don’t know what their doing.

Read full topic
item.source: Could I do GWD? Got any tips for me?

Yeah exactly, that means I won’t be doing godwars for a while so i don’t have any deaths or major loss of items to worry about.

item.title: Could I do GWD? Got any tips for me?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:32, topic:354303”][quote author=Exion link=topic=450597.msg3311008#msg3311008 date=1281984501]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=450597.msg3310961#msg3310961 date=1281983041]

I get 4 kills a trip soloing KBD, 77 range and full void.
[/quote]Have you gotten any good drops?

Nah not really, I got like 100 yews and shit. 5 rune longswords etc.
[/quote]He drops bad stuff, I’ve tried him before.[/quote]Well if you solo you almost always make a profit.

Btw, I always used Dhide with my 89 range

Read full topic

[/quote]Yeah, yeah. But I still think my guide will work.

Ouch, what happened?
[/quote]Splash after splash after splash ._. Atleast at that time I could still kill it 2-3 times a trip when I solo’d[/quote]Yea, dragonhide had pretty high mage defense >.<

item.source: Could I do GWD? Got any tips for me?

item.title: Could I do GWD? Got any tips for me?
item.dc:creator: @liam_2kill liam 2kill
item.description:
@liam_2kill wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:8, topic:354303”]No. Brain dead monkeys can’t do GWD. Get your prayer up. Worrying about keeping your prayer from bottoming out is the last thing you want to be doing. Range is only really useful in the Armadyl dungeon. And if you are going to go in a group, I suggest having someone be a Juggernaut. Basically that person has an extremely high Defense and Range, and goes in and attacks Garaador first, so Garaador will focus all his attacks on that person. The other 3 or 4 people can then come in and mass the shit out of him.

But ya, you’re going to fail.[/quote]

This.

Read full topic

item.source: Could I do GWD? Got any tips for me?

item.title: Could I do GWD? Got any tips for me?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:18, topic:354303”]Went from 94- 117 in 2 weeks lol. Just waiting for more summoning supplies to sell and atm doing mage to 94

OT: with team of 5+ people that know what they are doing and are 120+[/quote]I did gwd on a friends account, everyone was 110(-) like 4 people, and I had less than 60 prayer…

[quote=“m.dog311, post:8, topic:354303”]No. Brain dead monkeys can’t do GWD. Get your prayer up. Worrying about keeping your prayer from bottoming out is the last thing you want to be doing. Range is only really useful in the Armadyl dungeon. And if you are going to go in a group, I suggest having someone be a Juggernaut. Basically that person has an extremely high Defense and Range, and goes in and attacks Garaador first, so Garaador will focus all his attacks on that person. The other 3 or 4 people can then come in and mass the shit out of him.

But ya, you’re going to fail.[/quote]Done it before, soooooo…
(BTW - It’s called a tank)

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:7, topic:354303”]70 Prayer and 70Ranged plspls then I’ll take you on a duo.[/quote]Why ranged? I will be wearing veracs, and not ranging.

[quote=“Chassy13, post:12, topic:354303”]No. Well yes, but the chance of you finding a team that will accept you will be more difficult than killing the boss.

Most masses will only accept lvl 110+, lvl 115+, etc. You also need a godsword, as unless you have extreme potions and d claws they won’t accept a whip. I’ve joined several masses in the past few days and they all had either a 115+ or 120+ requirement.

No. Brain dead monkeys can’t do GWD. Get your prayer up. Worrying about keeping your prayer from bottoming out is the last thing you want to be doing. Range is only really useful in the Armadyl dungeon. And if you are going to go in a group, I suggest having someone be a Juggernaut. Basically that person has an extremely high Defense and Range, and goes in and attacks Garaador first, so Garaador will focus all his attacks on that person. The other 3 or 4 people can then come in and mass the shit out of him.

But ya, you’re going to fail.

Also called a tank, but they don’t need range. They need guthans and high defense, in which they attack Graardor first and then attack a minion to heal while Graardor attacks him. After Graardor is dead, they heal on the ranged minion while the rest of the team kills the mage one and finally the melee.[/quote]I already stated, we did a full trip, I was allowed to use a whip with just supers… I have no idea what you are talking about. We had 1 tank which was a torag, 1 ranger, and 2 people with whips.

@Everyone - No more ranged suggestions, I wont need it; as I already stated I will be doing Bandos and wearing veracs.
I’m using the tip.it guide for this and it says what I’m wearing is fine.

The only thing that it agrees with is that I should also increase my prayer.

Read full topic

item.title: Could I do GWD? Got any tips for me?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“im hard, post:14, topic:354303”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=450597.msg3305262#msg3305262 date=1281618291]
No. Brain dead monkeys can’t do GWD. Get your prayer up. Worrying about keeping your prayer from bottoming out is the last thing you want to be doing. Range is only really useful in the Armadyl dungeon. And if you are going to go in a group, I suggest having someone be a Juggernaut. Basically that person has an extremely high Defense and Range, and goes in and attacks Garaador first, so Garaador will focus all his attacks on that person.
The other 3 or 4 people can then come in and mass the shit out of him.

But ya, you’re going to fail.
[/quote]

I thought there was a prayer alter at godwars bosses?[/quote]I think you can only use them once every 5 - 10 minutes iirc.

Read full topic

Range is only really useful in the Armadyl dungeon. And if you are going to go in a group, I suggest having someone be a Juggernaut. item.title: Could I do GWD? Got any tips for me?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

No. Well yes, but the chance of you finding a team that will accept you will be more difficult than killing the boss.

Most masses will only accept lvl 110+, lvl 115+, etc. You also need a godsword, as unless you have extreme potions and d claws they won’t accept a whip. I’ve joined several masses in the past few days and they all had either a 115+ or 120+ requirement.

[quote=“m.dog311, post:8, topic:354303”]No. Brain dead monkeys can’t do GWD. Get your prayer up. Worrying about keeping your prayer from bottoming out is the last thing you want to be doing. Range is only really useful in the Armadyl dungeon. And if you are going to go in a group, I suggest having someone be a Juggernaut. Basically that person has an extremely high Defense and Range, and goes in and attacks Garaador first, so Garaador will focus all his attacks on that person. The other 3 or 4 people can then come in and mass the shit out of him.

But ya, you’re going to fail.[/quote]

Also called a tank, but they don’t need range. They need guthans and high defense, in which they attack Graardor first and then attack a minion to heal while Graardor attacks him. After Graardor is dead, they heal on the ranged minion while the rest of the team kills the mage one and finally the melee.

Read full topic
